text: @FLOTUS @POTUS Oh do shut up - this is all for show & the campaign. No one is safe with the IMPOTUS squatting in the WH. COVID-19 is spreading exponentially due to his stupidity, he gassed his own people for a photo op, both are you are responsible for children in cages & dividing this nation
